docs.text: Chris Fletcher Fitness About me I was left unable to exercise for a long time after having multiple surgeries on my lower back from 2016-2017. These surgeries meant I had to stop following my activity targets, and almost made me lose my passion for fitness. Once I was all healed up, I made a promise to myself that I would improve my fitness for my physical and mental health. My goal now is to help improve the wellness of other people, whether that be helping you reach s particular fitness goal or just getting you moving. Explore this site My rates Locations Contacts Feedback
docs.title: Home

docs.text: I was left unable to exercise for a long time after having multiple surgeries on my lower back from 2016-2017. These surgeries meant I had to stop following my activity targets, and almost made me lose my passion for fitness. Once I was all healed up, I made a promise to myself that I would improve my fitness for my physical and mental health. My goal now is to help improve the wellness of other people, whether that be helping you reach s particular fitness goal or just getting you moving.
